mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY_CODE ='B2'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, USER_NAME, DEPT_NAME, B.CATEGORY_CODE, B.IMPORTANCE_LEVEL, B.COUNT, B.CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT USING (DEPT_CODE) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.CATEGORY_CODE = 'B2' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT,CATEGORY_CODE, IMPORTANCE_LEVEL, COUNT, B.CREATE_DATE, USER_NAME, DEPT_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (B.BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT USING (DEPT_CODE) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno} AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ATTACHMENT_NO, REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM BOARD_ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = #{bno} AND STATUS='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_WRITER, CATEGORY_CODE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, IMPORTANCE_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardWriter}, #{categoryCode}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{importanceLevel})

INSERT INTO BOARD_ATTACHMENT (ATTACHMENT_NO, REF_BNO, CATEGORY_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_BANO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, #{categoryCode}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath})

INSERT INTO BOARD_ATTACHMENT (ATTACHMENT_NO, REF_BNO, CATEGORY_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_BANO.NEXTVAL, #{refBno}, #{categoryCode}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}, BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle} , BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, IMPORTANCE_LEVEL =#{importanceLevel}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
